title: Sieve of Sundaram
subtitle: Generate all prime numbers less than a given number using Sundaram's method
code: while i + j + 2 * i * j <= k:
additional_information: Sieve of Sundaram generates all primes less than n by eliminating numbers of the form i + j + 2ij. The remaining numbers, when transformed by 2x + 1, are primes.
